law.text: Persons holding earnings or real or personal property in Kentucky of obligors who owe child support shall honor valid orders of other states' courts to enforce child support obligations.
law.history: Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 411, sec. 28, effective July 15, 1988. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 144, sec. 14, effective July 13, 1984.
